prompt.item: If you have any other issues just call me? (y/n)
Anything else to ask? (y/n)
Do you have any other problems? (y/n)
Alright, but first I need some information from you.
I will help you, but I will ask you for a quick info first.
Don't worry, I will help you with the issue, just a quick info first.
Glab everything is ok, wish you a wonderful day.
Perfect, wish you a great day.
I couldn't catch that.
What did you want to say?
I couldn't understand, can you repeat?
Hello, I am the IT Service Desk virtual assistant. Before you report your problem I need some information from you.
DIALOG_COMPLETED
Enter your full name?
What is your full name?
How can I call you?
Thank you, {var-user_name}! Now I will need your email address?
Wonderful! What is your telephone number?
Perfect! Now I need the location of the fault. A university building, room number, street name, city, etc.
I would like you to enter a full description of your problem, including error messages, device type and name, etc. (describe)
Probably you misspelled something! Try typing your answer again.
Are you sure that you gave me an appropriate answer! Try again.
Sorry but I wasn't able to catch that - try one more time!
Now I would ask you some more questions about the problem with your email address.
I need to ask you bonus questions regarding the problem with your email address.
Now I would ask you some more questions about your web network problem.
I need to ask you bonus questions regarding the problem with the web network.
Now I would ask you some more questions about your wireless network problem.
I need to ask you bonus questions regarding the problem with the wireless network.
Are you a student or a member of staff? (staff/student)
Probably you misspelled something! Answer the question again.
Are you sure that you gave me an appropriate answer! Try again.
Sorry but I wasn't able to catch that - try one more time!
Are you able to log into my.bham.ac.uk or canvas.bham.ac.uk? (y/n)
Your account may be locked out. You need to unlock it at my.password.bham.ac.uk - this must fix the issue! Do you still have a problem? (y/n)
Your problem might be in the email.
Glab everything is ok, wish you a wonderful day.
Perfect, wish you a great day.
Probably you misspelled something! Answer the question again.
Are you sure that you gave me an appropriate answer! Try again.
Sorry but I wasn't able to catch that - try one more time!
Probably you misspelled something! Answer the question again.
Are you sure that you gave me an appropriate answer! Try again.
Sorry but I wasn't able to catch that - try one more time!
Please, tell me how are you trying to view your email? (web/client)
Try viewing you email at '{var-email-user_email}'. Are you able to get email there? (y/n)
Have you tried rebooting the computer? (y/n)
Your problem must lie with the software. Further investigation needed. Before I procceed your problem to our team, I need some more information from you.
Perhaps the issue is with the software. I will procceed the problem to our team, but first I need to ask you some more questions.
Reboot the computer and come back if there is still an issue.
Probably you misspelled something! Answer the question again.
Are you sure that you gave me an appropriate answer! Try again.
Sorry but I wasn't able to catch that - try one more time!
Does it work on another browser? (y/n)
Are you using your full email address username@student.bham.ac.uk? (y/n)
Issue must lie with the account. Further investigation needed. Before I procceed your problem to our team, I need some further information from you.
Did using that help? (y/n)
Wonderful! Happy that I managed to help you.
Issue must lie with the account. Further investigation needed. Before I procceed your problem to our team, I need some further information from you.
Your problem must lie with the account. Further investigation needed. Before I procceed your problem to our team, I need some more information from you.
Perhaps the issue is with the account. I will proccees the problem to our team, but first I need to ask you some more questions.

Are you sure that you gave me an appropriate answer! Try again.
Sorry but I wasn't able to catch that - try one more time!

grammar.item: The name of my computer is

prompt.item: Thank you. Now I will need you to enter all the error messages that you receive.

Wonderful! Your information is - Name: {var-user_name}, Email: {var-user_email}, Tel: {var-user_tel}, Location: {var-user_loc}, Problem: {var-problem_type}, Type of user: {var-email-user_type}, Name of computer: {var-user-computer_name}, Error messages: {var-user_errormessages}. I will send it to our team.
Is the network slow or totally down? (slow/down)
Has it ever worked? (y/n)
The network need to be registered in order to work. I need to ask you some more questions.
It seems that the web network need registration, I will need some more info from you.
Probably you misspelled something! Answer the question again.
Are you sure that you gave me an appropriate answer! Try again.
Sorry but I wasn't able to catch that - try one more time!
Probably you misspelled something! Answer the question again.
Are you sure that you gave me an appropriate answer! Try again.
Sorry but I wasn't able to catch that - try one more time!
How many people are affected? (many/justme)
Probably there is an issue with the network. Investigation is need from our team. But before sending your details I need some more information.
Well, so the problem is with the network. I will ask you more questions before sending the issue detaisl to our team.
Are the cables connected and with green solid light and amber flashing light? (y/n)
Have you tried rebooting the computer? (y/n)
Perhaps there is an issue with the PC. Before forwarding your information to our team, I need to ask you some more questions.
Probably you have a problem with the PC. In order to be fixed, I need some more info from you that I will forward to our team.
Reboot the computer and come back if there is still an issue.
Probably you misspelled something! Answer the question again.
Are you sure that you gave me an appropriate answer! Try again.
Sorry but I wasn't able to catch that - try one more time!

prompt.item: Enter your computer's MAC address. (mac address)
Perfect. Now tell me what is your network SSID? (network SSID)
I will one last thing. What time did you try to connect to the Wifi?

Wonderful! Your information is - Name: {var-user_name}, Email: {var-user_email}, Tel: {var-user_tel}, Location: {var-user_loc}, Problem: {var-problem_type}, Device type: {var-user-device_type}, MAC address: {var-user_macaddress}, Network SSID: {var-user_networkssid}, Time of attempted connection: {var-user_networkattemptedconnection}. I will send it to our team.

var.name: IT_Tel
var.description: Telophone number of the IT services desk

var.name: IT_Email
var.description: Email of IT the services desk

var.name: var-email-user_email
var.description: The email that user has to check

var.name: var-problem_type
var.description: The main area of the user's problem

var.name: var-user_errormessages
var.description: Error messages received from the user

var.name: var-user_macaddress
var.description: The MAC address of user's computer

var.name: var-user_macaddress
var.description: The MAC address of user's computer

var.name: var-user_networkattemptedconnection
var.description: Error messages received from the user
